N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 501.4 - Application for permit

State Regulations

An application for permit accompanied by the required
nonrefundable fee shall be filed with the regional office of the department on
forms supplied by the department and shall contain such information as the
commissioner shall require in order to determine whether the proposed activity
will impair the operation of flood control works or impede the maintenance
thereof, including access for operation and maintenance. Maps, plans, drawings
and similar supporting information shall be on sheets not to exceed 30 by 48
inches. Review of the application and supporting information shall begin only
after all necessary information has been furnished by the applicant. The
nonrefundable fees shall be as follows: (a) $25 for applications for permits for
residential property when the applicant is the owner or tenant; and
(b) $75 for all applications other than
subdivision (a) of this section. Notes
